verses.name: 2 Kings 25:10
verses.text: And all the army of the Chaldees, that were with the captain of the guard, brake down the walls of Jerusalem round about.

verses.name: 2 Kings 25:11
verses.text: Now the rest of the people that were left in the city, and the fugitives that fell away to the king of Babylon, with the remnant of the multitude, did Nebuzar–adan the captain of the guard carry away.

verses.name: 2 Kings 25:12
verses.text: But the captain of the guard left of the poor of the land to be vinedressers and husbandmen.
